title: Charlie's Playground
description: The fellas welcome OG Media Superstar, Charlie Hurt to talk animal fighting and space before playing a rousing game of Dem or Journo. Sen. Shelley Moore Capito appears as a special guest.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Josh Holmes, Michael Duncan, Comfortably Smug, Charlie Hurt, Shelley Moore Capito)
